verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> or Song <S%H7892><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korah <S%H7141><s%>. His foundation <S%H3248><s%> is in the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountains <S%H2042><s%>. for the sons: or, of the sons
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> more than all the dwellings <S%H4908><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>.
Glorious things <S%H3513><s%> are spoken <S%H1696><s%> of thee, O city <S%H5892><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> of Rahab <S%H7294><s%> and Babylon <S%H894><s%> to them that know <S%H3045><s%> me: behold Philistia <S%H6429><s%>, and Tyre <S%H6865><s%>, with Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>; this man was born <S%H3205><s%> there.
And of Zion <S%H6726><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%>, This and that man <S%H376><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> in her: and the highest <S%H5945><s%> himself shall establish <S%H3559><s%> her.
The LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall count <S%H5608><s%>, when he writeth up <S%H3789><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, that this man was born <S%H3205><s%> there. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
As well the singers <S%H7891><s%> as the players <S%H2490><s%> on instruments shall be there: all my springs <S%H4599><s%> are in thee.
